scripts.build: rm -rf docs && rm -rf dist && rollup -c && yarn docs
scripts.git-push: echo $message && git add . && echo "Adding changes for " | git commit -F - && yarn publish --patch --no-git-tag-version && version="v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")"  && git add . && echo $version | git commit -F - ; git push origin main && echo $version | git tag -a $(echo $version) -F - && git push origin --tags ; echo
scripts.push: f() { message=${1}; yarn build; yarn git-push; }; f
